repository.orgName: Staats- und UniversitätsBibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: A palm leaf manuscript containing the fifth (i.e. RV 6.62-8.11) and the seventh aṣṭakas (i.e. RV 9.44-10.45) of the Ṛgveda Saṃhitā (saṃhitapāṭha text), with Vedic accent marked.

msItem.title: Ṛgveda
msItem.rubric: śubham astu | śrīgaṇādhipataye namaḥ | śrīśāradāgurubhyo namaḥ | hariḥ oṃ
msItem.incipit:
stuṣe narā divo asya prasaṃtāśvinā huve jaramāṇo arkaiḥ | yā sadya usrā vyuṣi jmo antān yuyūṣataḥ pary urū varāṁsi || tā ya
jñam ā śucibhiḥ ścakramāṇā rathasya bhānuṃ rurucū rajobhiḥ | purū varāṃsy amitā mimānāpo dhanvāny ati yātho ajrān | tā ha tyad vartir yad aradhram ugretthā dhiya ūhathuḥ
msItem.explicit:
caraṃtu naḥ | abudhram u tya iṃdravaṃto agnayaḥ | striyaṃ dṛṣṭvāya kitavaṃ tatāpa | sabhām eti kitavaḥ pṛcchamānaḥ | prāvepā mā bṛhato mādayaṃti | yasya prasvādaso giraḥ | pra mā yuyujre prayujo janā||—|| pra mā yuyujre mahad adya samāna
m u tyam nava ||
msItem.finalRubric: hariḥ oṃ śrīkṛṣṇārpaṇam astu ||—|| iti saptamāṣṭakaḥ samāptaḥ ||—| śīnaṃduṇḍāya namaḥ ||—|| śīnārasiṃhāya namaḥ || śrīveṃkateśāyanaḥ ||—|| śrīgurubhyo namaḥ ||—|| śrīgaṇādhipateye namaḥ ||—||—||—|

extent.measure: 2 guard folios inserted at the beginning of the bundle, 123 numbered folios (f. 33 bears two numbers on it, 33 and 34, while f. 34 is missing).

supportDesc.foliation: Nandināgarī numerals, on the left top margin of the recto, 1 to 123, with f. 33 numbered twice (33 and 34) and f. 34 missing.

handNote.desc: Very clear and regular hand, with accents marked

additions.desc:
Title on the recto of the first guard folio in Nandināgarī, uninked: paṃcaṣāṣṭakasaptaṣāṣṭakasaha
pustakaṃ

listBibl.bibl: Janert, Klaus Ludwig, Poti, N. Narasimhan. 1985. Verzeichnis der orientalischen Handschriften in Deutschland. Band II, 7. Stuttgart: F. Steiner. p. 853. MS no. 2257.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces between words added where possible.
